settings.queueFullMessage: The queue is currently full. Please try again later.
settings.alreadyInQueueMessage: {username}, you are already in the queue at position {position}.
settings.notInQueueMessage: {username}, you are not in the queue.
settings.positionMessage: {username}, you are position {position} in the queue. Wait time: {waitTime} minutes.
settings.requireMessageText: {username}, please provide a message when joining the queue. Example: !join YourGameUsername
